channel.title: Question
channel.description: How do you become a community member?

item.title: Question
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

[quote=“Tico, post:12, topic:366837”][quote author=Davidi2 link=topic=463034.msg3387223#msg3387223 date=1288564466]

To become a MoparScape vet you must have 50 rep.

And must be voted in by the current Vets.

Though, you also get Vet for earning Moderator status.

I don’t think getting mod makes you a vet, because khil wasn’t a vet when he was a mod.

All MoparScape mods are automatically given the vet title. Other vets must be voted in by current vets.
[/quote]Kihomura wasn’t a vet, as Jmood said

Are you saying he wasn’t a vet when he WAS a mod, or he ISN’T a vet now?[/quote]He never was, and isn’t now

Read full topic

item.title: Question
item.dc:creator: @_Rich Rich
item.description:
@_Rich wrote:

Neither was I, or a lot of the others who are/were Moparscape moderators.

Read full topic

item.title: Question
item.dc:creator: @Rixxx Rix_
item.description:
@Rixxx wrote:

Rich:

Afaik, you’re supposed to get awarded the vet title when you become a moderator, maybe there was a reason he didn’t get it?

It was because he wasn’t nominated in.

Read full topic

You have to earn it mate. You have to earn the reputation at least. You will have the same amount of post count as on here.

item.title: Question
item.dc:creator: @Jace_Ronald Jace Ronald
item.description:
@Jace_Ronald wrote:

[quote=“jme, post:4, topic:366837”][quote author=Jace Ronald link=topic=463034.msg3386959#msg3386959 date=1288547453]
I messed up I meant how do I become a community member.
[/quote]

You need 50 rep points on http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf (Use the same login details as here) and then you are reviewed by an admin. Remember to never ask for rep.

The best way to gain rep points is to contribute to the community.[/quote]

Thank you very much, and I will start foruming on there also!

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @jme jme
item.description:

I messed up I meant how do I become a community member.

You need 50 rep points on http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf (Use the same login details as here) and then you are reviewed by an admin. Remember to never ask for rep.

The best way to gain rep points is to contribute to the community.

item.title: Question
item.dc:creator: @deathschaos9 DeathsChaos9
item.description:
@deathschaos9 wrote:

Member - 50 posts
Senior Member - 100 posts
Community Member - 50 rep on both MITB and MSCP and you have to get voted in (I think)
MoparScape Veteran - Have to be voted in

Whats a general member? Just the ‘Member’ rank?

Read full topic
